data.text: @pajolicoe I hope things get better man, here's hoping
@pajolicoe @FrancoisOuell15 There is also an as yet unexplained case in Putuo that was announced this afternoon. So. Much. Fun.
@pajolicoe @FrancoisOuell15 What?! Changsha! I promise it wasn’t me haha. But Changsha is pretty good with responding quickly to cases.
@pajolicoe So it's the Death Star? Hope all is well.

@pajolicoe Two weeks before we went, we first tried to go to SH, but learned at the station that we needed a test. It's no big deal, but frustrating bc it changes all the time, very hard to plan any trip.

@FrancoisOuell15 Shanghai almost never needs a test to get in. It’s not their style. Other places are much more cautious. Seems someone came from overseas through Shanghai, just went to Changsha and discovered he’s a case. Now 3 cases at Pudong.

@pajolicoe Cases in Shanghai? I went there last week from HZ, and it was very confusing. They said no test required to go there, but others said we need a test to come back, and others still said we don't need. In the end, we didn't need any.
